attributes.action: Hold the media accountable for scaremongering
attributes.additional_details: The bodies that govern the media do not accept reports for scaremongering in their list for reporting. The recent COVID-19 attention in the media has sparked panic buying when it is not necessary, which creates more problems for people trying to complete a normal shop and a shortage of necessities for those more vulnerable in society. It causes people to lose jobs, businesses and affects the overall economy negatively.
attributes.background: We need to be able to hold the media/news outlets accountable for scaremongering the public.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303050

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
